title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Traveling Trunks
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Traveling Trunks              Traveling Trunks        The traveling trunk includes many educational items. An NPS Photo     Hagerman Fossil Beds offers our amazing traveling trunk. The traveling trunk was developed to help teachers bring the wonders of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument a little closer to students and assist them in better understanding and appreciating this tremendous resource.  Trunks are geared for grades 4-6 or 7-12 and include: casts of horse skulls, soil samples, books, videos, and curriculum guides. It provides a variety of information about Idaho, as well as paleontology and geology.   Teachers may borrow them for up to one month. There is no charge for their use. The only cost is the return shipping.    Reserve a trunk today!
